title: Sea-Fisheries and Maritime Jurisdiction Act 2006 (No. 8 of 2006) and the SeaFisheries, Foreshore and Dumping at Sea (Transfer of Departmental
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the Sea-Fisheries (Quotas) (Deep-
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Sea-Fisheries (Quotas) (Deep-

Sea Stocks) Regulations 2021.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited sea-fisheries (quotas) (deep- sea stocks) regulation 2021

title: Sea-Fisheries and Maritime Jurisdiction Act 2006 (No. 8 of 2006) and the SeaFisheries, Foreshore and Dumping at Sea (Transfer of Departmental
heading: 2. (1) In these Regulations “Deep Sea Quota Regulation” means Council
text_raw:
2. (1) In these Regulations “Deep Sea Quota Regulation” means Council 

Regulation (EU) 2021/91 of 28 January 2021. 

(2) A word or expression that is used in the Deep Sea Quota Regulation 
and is also used in these Regulations, has, unless the context otherwise 
requires, the same meaning in these Regulations as it has in the Deep Sea 
Quota Regulation.
text_norm: 2 (1) regulation deep sea quota regulation mean council regulation (eu) 2021 91 28 january 2021 (2) word expression used deep sea quota regulation also used regulation unless context otherwise requires meaning regulation deep sea quota regulation

title: Sea-Fisheries and Maritime Jurisdiction Act 2006 (No. 8 of 2006) and the SeaFisheries, Foreshore and Dumping at Sea (Transfer of Departmental
heading: The master of -
text_raw:
3. 

The master of - 

(a) 

(b) 

an Irish sea-fishing boat wherever it may be, or 

a sea-fishing boat in the exclusive fishing limits of the State 

shall comply with the requirement imposed by the Deep Sea Quota 
Regulation in respect of fishing vessels and masters of such vessels.
text_norm: 3 master - (a) (b) irish sea-fishing boat wherever may sea-fishing boat exclusive fishing limit state shall comply requirement imposed deep sea quota regulation respect fishing vessel master vessel

title: Sea-Fisheries and Maritime Jurisdiction Act 2006 (No. 8 of 2006) and the SeaFisheries, Foreshore and Dumping at Sea (Transfer of Departmental
heading: The Sea-Fisheries (Quotas) (Deep-Sea Stocks) Regulations 2019 (S.I.
text_raw:
4. 

The Sea-Fisheries (Quotas) (Deep-Sea Stocks) Regulations 2019 (S.I. 
No. 70 of 2019) are revoked. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

11 February, 2021. 

CHARLIE MCCONALOGUE, 

Minister for Agriculture, Food and the Marine. 

1 OJ L 31, 29.01.2021, p.20 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 19th February, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [70] 3

title: Sea-Fisheries and Maritime Jurisdiction Act 2006 (No. 8 of 2006) and the SeaFisheries, Foreshore and Dumping at Sea (Transfer of Departmental
heading: (This note is not part of the instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations give effect to the provisions of Council Regulation (EU) 
2021/91 of 28 January 2021 fixing for 2021 and 2022 the fishing opportunities 
for Union fishing vessels for certain deep sea fish stocks. 

 
 
 
 
 
 4 [70]
